about_the_game:
Pote Pote Dream is an action RPG featuring Pote Pote, a timid teddy bear who cannot fight on his own, summons allies to battle. Set in the dream world of his owner, a girl, Pote Pote fights against her inner troubles to save her.

Summon Allies to Drive Away Negative Emotions

Frightened Pote Pote can't fight on its own, but he can call on friends for help. Summon allies to favorable positions, distract enemies, and move around the map according to the situation.

Vibrant Stages Made of Felt

Each stage is crafted from handmade felt plushies and set to original, pop music. The map is randomly generated each time, offering a unique gameplay experience with every playthrough.

Collect Diverse Allies to Form Your Own Team

Earn points by challenging stages, and use these points to gather strong allies and build your team. Combine unique allies with stamina, long-range attack capabilities, and other special traits to create your ideal team.

Randomly Generated Dungeons

After clearing the story, you can repeatedly play in dungeons that are randomly generated.
